attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All too often in the past, Political Parties have made stunning promises in their Election Manifesto's about what they will do if we elect them. Then, as soon as they have the keys to Number 10, all the promises are forgotten or there not practical to implement.

Party Manifesto's must be made legally binding on the Party involved and should they not keep their promises, without just cause (to be decided by a panel of serving Judges), a new General Election will be called immediately.
